archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0740
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As customer, when I am checking the progress of an order, I want to be able to get support from the order itself, without needing to go elsewhere, so that If I need their support on the order, I can easily be in touch the right person at Vodafone

properties.value: We assume this is a case registered in a context of the order which will be assigned to the correct support group. To be discussed on dedicated workshop

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
